# C++ Header Template

This is an example of a C++ project that separates the declaration of a class in a header file (`.h`) from its implementation. (`.cpp`).

## How build and execute

To compile this project, you need to pass all the `.cpp` files to the compiler.

```bash
g++ main.cpp greeter.cpp -o my_app

./my_app
```

### Exit line

```
Hello from the Greeter class!
```
